instructions:
Here are the steps you need to follow to convert your 3DS files to DWG.

Go to Aspose.3D conversion appUpload your 3DS file to the browserSelect DWG as output file formatPress the Convert button

Once the download option appears, save the converted DWG file to your PC.
You can perform 3DS to DWG conversions within your C#, Java, and Python applications, as demonstrated in the subsequent sections.

Transforming 3DS files into the DWG format using the Aspose.3D for .NET API is a straightforward procedure. This robust API empowers you to create resilient applications that can seamlessly convert 3DS files into various formats.
